text: Territorial Assembly elections were held in Moyen-Congo on 31 March 1957. The Democratic Union for the Defence of African Interests and the African Socialist Movement both won 17 seats. Voter turnout was 74.2%.Dolf Sternberger, Bernhard Vogel, Dieter Nohlen & Klaus Landfried (1978) Die Wahl der Parlamente: Band II: Afrika, Erster Halbband, p1050 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats |- |align=left|Democratic Union for the Defence of African Interests||rowspan=2|108,057||rowspan=2| ||17 |- |align=left|Moyen-Congo Union||5 |- |align=left|African Socialist Movement||rowspan=4|83,721||rowspan=4| ||17 |- |align=left|French Section of the Workers' International||2 |- |align=left|Democratic and Socialist Union of the Resistance||1 |- |align=left|Rally of the French People||1 |- |align=left|MSA–PCC||40,999|| ||– |- |align=left|Congolese Progressive Party||30,121|| ||2 |- |align=left|Union for the Defence of Kouilou||17,026|| ||0 |- |align=left|Movement for the Social Evolution of Black Africa||3,027|| ||0 |- |align=left|Independent Socialists||1,376|| ||0 |- |align=left|Independents||780|| ||0 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||12,249||–||– |- |align=left|Total||297,356 ||100||45 |- |align=left|Registered voters/turnout||400,847||74.2||– |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Sternberger et al. |} ==References== Category:1957 elections in Africa Category:1957 in Moyen-Congo 1957
title: 1957 Moyen-Congo Territorial Assembly election
